name: Faux Fur Fabric/ Teddy Fur/Plush / Light Brown 1 Yard
description:
This listing is for 1 yard, 60 inches wide, of light brown faux fur/plush. 
It is soft synthetic fur /plush made from polyester.

The back side feels and looks like polar fleece. 
Great for clothing, crafts,toys,stuffed animals, dog/cat beds....

I have more yards availible. :0) 
From a smoke free home!
